title: The Trap of the Rooftop Farm

infobox.Title:: The Trap of the Rooftop Farm
infobox.Japanese title:: 屋上農園の罠  (Okujō Nōen no Wana)

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Sayuri Sadaoka as Misa Mejiro  Somei Uchida as Shinichiro Taguchi  Kazuhiko Kishino as Takehiko Nakamura  Rio Natsuki as Marie Inoue

sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are invited by one of their friends to assist in a rooftop farm. Once there, they discover the elderly farmer, Takehiko Nakamura, dead from a head injury.

The police are brought in and the other three farmers are interrogated for the death.
